summary.span: 为定位和编辑 XML 数据提供游标模型。

span.span: Provides a cursor model for navigating and editing XML data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间中的 类是一个抽象类，用于定义用于导航和编辑 XML 信息项作为 XQuery 1.0 和 XPath 2.0 数据模型的实例的游标模型。The class in the namespace is an abstract class which defines a cursor model for navigating and editing XML information items as instances of the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model. 对象是从实现 接口（如 和 类）的类创建的。An object is created from a class that implements the interface such as the and classes. 由 对象创建的对象是只读的，但可以编辑 对象创建的 对象。 objects created by objects are read-only while objects created by objects can be edited. 对象的只读或可编辑状态是使用 类的 属性确定的。An object's read-only or editable status is determined using the property of the class. 有关使用 XPath 数据模型处理 XML 数据的详细信息，请参阅[使用 Xpath 数据模型处理 Xml 数据](~/docs/standard/data/xml/process-xml-data-using-the-xpath-data-model.md)主题。For more information about processing XML data using the XPath data model, see the [Process XML Data Using the XPath Data Model](~/docs/standard/data/xml/process-xml-data-using-the-xpath-data-model.md) topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于使用 类（如 类）而引发的异常可能包含不应在不受信任的方案中公开的敏感信息。Exceptions raised as a result of using the class, such as the class, may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 应正确处理异常，以便不受信任的情况下不公开此敏感信息。Exceptions should be properly handled so that this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios.

summary.span: 返回一个 对象，该对象用于在当前节点的子节点列表的末尾创建一个或多个新的子节点。

span.span: Returns an object used to create one or more new child nodes at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node.

returns.span: 一个 对象，该对象用于在当前节点的子节点列表的末尾创建新的子节点。

span.span: An object used to create new child nodes at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加子节点会将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。Appending child nodes adds the new nodes to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果有三个子节点用于某个元素，则第一个追加的节点将成为第四个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the first appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果不存在子节点，则创建一个新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 在调用 对象的 方法之前，不会插入新的子节点。The new child node is not inserted until the method of the object is called. - 仅当 位于根节点或元素节点上时， 方法才有效。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不会影响 的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . 您可以向编写器写入多个节点。You can write more than one node to the writer. 所有节点都追加到当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。All nodes are appended to the end of the list of child nodes of the current node. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，使用从 方法返回的 对象将新的 `pages` 子元素追加到 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的子元素列表中。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object returned from the method. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加子节点会将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果有三个子节点用于某个元素，则追加的节点将成为第四个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果不存在子节点，则创建一个新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 若要创建新的元素节点，请在 XML 字符串参数中包含所有 XML 语法。To create a new element node, include all XML syntax in the XML string parameter. 新 `book` 节点的字符串将 `AppendChild("")`。The string for a new `book` node is `AppendChild("")`. 为当前节点的文本节点追加文本 "book" 的字符串 `AppendChild("book")`。The string for appending the text "book" to the current node's text node is `AppendChild("book")`. 如果 XML 字符串包含多个节点，则添加所有节点。If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added. 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 仅当 位于根节点或元素节点上时， 方法才有效。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不会影响 的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中，在 `pages` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的子元素列表上追加新的 `contosoBooks.xml` 子元素。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#2)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加子节点会将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果有三个子节点用于某个元素，则追加的节点将成为第四个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果不存在子节点，则创建一个新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果 对象置于 XML 节点序列上，则将添加序列中的所有节点。If the object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added. - 仅当 位于根节点或元素节点上时， 方法才有效。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不会影响 的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，使用指定的 对象将新的 `pages` 子元素追加到 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的子元素列表中。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object specified. 指定了 `http://www.contoso.com/books` 命名空间，以便使用与 XML 文档相同的命名空间追加新的子元素。The `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace is specified so that the new child element is appended using the same namespace as the XML document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加子节点会将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果有三个子节点用于元素节点，则追加的节点将成为第四个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element node, the appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果不存在子节点，则创建一个新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 可以通过使用 方法或 方法来获取命名空间前缀和 URI 值。Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained by using the method or the method. 例如，下面的语法通过使用范围内命名空间 `xmlns:bk=http://www.contoso.com/books`追加一个子元素：For example, the following syntax appends a child element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk=http://www.contoso.com/books`: ```csharp navigator.AppendChildElement(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` 这会创建新的子 `` 元素。This creates the new child `` element. 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果指定的命名空间前缀 `null` 或 ，则新元素的命名空间 URI 的前缀将从作用域内的当前命名空间中获取。If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or , then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果当前范围内未给指定的命名空间 URI 分配命名空间前缀，则会自动生成一个命名空间前缀。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated. - 仅当 位于根节点或元素节点上时， 方法才有效。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不会影响 的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中，在 `pages` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的子元素列表上追加新的 `contosoBooks.xml` 子元素。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#5)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#5)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 联网的 XML 文档包含数据块，使用各种 W3C 标准包含机制进行聚合，因此包含来自不同位置的节点。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data, aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms, and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. DTD 实体是此聚合数据的一个示例，但并不限于 Dtd。DTD entities are an example of this aggregated data, but it is not limited to DTDs. 属性告诉您这些节点的来源。The property tells you where these nodes originate from. 例如，如果 XML 数据是从 `http://server/mydata.xml`加载的，则 属性将返回 `http://server/mydata.xml`。For example, if the XML data is loaded from `http://server/mydata.xml`, the property returns `http://server/mydata.xml`. > [!NOTE] > 使用 类创建的节点与从中创建 的 XML 文档具有相同的 。Nodes created using the class have the same as the XML document the was created from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 方法验证包含在 中的 XML 数据是否符合 提供的架构中的全局类型或声明。The method verifies that the XML data contained in the conforms to a global type or declaration in the schema or schemas provided in the . - 方法不执行信息集补充。The method does not perform infoset augmentation. 这意味着不会应用架构默认值，文本值不会转换为原子值，也不会将新类型信息与信息项关联。This means that schema defaults are not applied, text values are not converted to atomic values, and no new type information is associated with information items. - 的 XML 数据中的架构 `xsi:schemaLocation` 或 `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` 提示将被忽略。Schema `xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` hints in the XML data of are ignored. - 如果 定位在文档节点上，则验证过程包括检查唯一性和引用约束（`xs:ID`、`xs:IDREF`、`xs:key`、`xs:keyref`和 `xs:unique`）。If the is positioned on a document node, the validation process includes checking of uniqueness and reference constraints (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, and `xs:unique`). 否则，将忽略这些检查。Otherwise, these checks are omitted. - 如果作为参数传递的 `null` 并且 定位在元素节点上，则 属性的 属性公开的类型信息用于检查节点的有效性。If the passed as a parameter is `null` and the is positioned on an element node, the type information exposed by the property's property is used to check the node's validity. 如果作为参数传递的 `null` 并且 定位在根节点上，则将使用文档元素（即根节点的子元素）的 属性。If the passed as a parameter is `null` and the is positioned on the root node, the property of the document element (that is, the element child of the root node) is used. 在这两种情况下，如果元素的 属性的 属性是 `null`，并且作为参数传递的 `null`，则会引发 ，因为没有要用于执行验证的类型信息。In both cases if the property of the element's property is `null` and the passed as a parameter is `null`, an is thrown because there is no type information to use to perform validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了 枚举。The following table describes the enumeration. |XmlNodeOrderXmlNodeOrder|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||此 的当前节点位于所提供的 的当前节点之前。The current node of this is before the current node of the supplied .| ||此 的当前节点位于所提供的 的当前节点之后。The current node of this is after the current node of the supplied .| ||这两个 对象位于同一节点上。The two objects are positioned on the same node.| ||不能以文档顺序相对于彼此来确定节点位置，也不能将 `null` 指定为 参数。The node positions cannot be determined relative to each other in the document order, or `null` is specified as the parameter. 如果两个节点驻留在不同的树中，则可能发生这种情况。This could occur if the two nodes reside in different trees.| 方法的行为取决于 当前所处 。The method's behavior is dependent on the the is currently positioned on. 在比较 XML 文档中的节点时，下列规则适用：When comparing nodes in the XML document, the following rules apply: - 节点：这些节点按文档顺序从源文档返回。 nodes: These nodes are returned in document order from the source document. - 节点：这些节点可以按文档顺序返回，并且始终位于父元素的 节点之前。 nodes: These nodes may be returned in document order and are always before the nodes of the parent element. - 节点：可以按文档顺序返回这些节点。 nodes: These nodes may be returned in document order. 它们始终位于父节点的 节点和子节点之前。They always come after the nodes and before any child nodes of the parent node. > [!NOTE] > 有关 XPath 数据模型的详细信息以及每个节点类型的详细信息，请参阅 W3C [XML 路径语言（XPath）](https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath/all/#data-model)建议的第5节。For more information about the XPath data model and details about each of the node types, see section 5 of the W3C [XML Path Language (XPath)](https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath/all/#data-model) recommendation. 此方法对 的状态没有影响。This method has no effect on the state of the . > [!NOTE] > 尽可能使用 方法，而不是 方法。Use the method rather than the method when possible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 或 方法获取命名空间前缀和 URI 值。Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained using the or method. 例如，下面的语法使用范围内命名空间 `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`创建特性：For example, the following syntax creates an attribute by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ```csharp editor.CreateAttribute(navigator.Prefix, "attributeName", LookupNamespace(navigator.Prefix), "text") ``` 这将在当前元素上创建 `` 的新属性。This creates the new attribute `` on the current element. 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果指定的命名空间前缀为 或 `null`，则将从作用域内的当前命名空间获取新属性的命名空间 URI 的前缀。If the namespace prefix specified is or `null`, the prefix for the namespace URI of the new attribute is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果当前范围内未给指定的命名空间 URI 分配命名空间前缀，则会自动生成一个命名空间前缀。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, a namespace prefix is automatically generated. 例如，若要在 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件的默认命名空间中的元素上创建新属性（`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`），请为命名空间前缀和命名空间 URI 参数指定 `null` 或 。For example to create a new attribute on an element in the default namespace of the `contosoBooks.xml` file, (`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`), you specify `null` or for both the namespace prefix and namespace URI parameters. 指定 `http://www.contoso.com/books` 作为命名空间 URI 参数将导致 方法自动为新属性生成命名空间前缀。Specifying `http://www.contoso.com/books` as the namespace URI parameter will cause the method to auto generate a namespace prefix for the new attribute. - 如果创建的新属性是一个命名空间节点，该节点与元素上的命名空间声明冲突，原因是所选的命名空间前缀是由同一范围内的另一个命名空间声明使用的，或者因为所选前缀与元素的名称相同，但绑定到不同的命名空间 URI，则会引发异常。If the new attribute created is a namespace node which conflicts with a namespace declaration on the element, either because the namespace prefix chosen is used by another namespace declaration at the same scope, or because the prefix chosen is the same as that of the element but is bound to a different namespace URI, an exception is thrown. - 方法不会影响 的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，将在 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的 `price` 子元素上创建一个新的 `discount` 特性。In the following example, a new `discount` attribute is created on the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#7)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#7)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 将 定位到元素上时， 方法创建的新属性将放置在当前元素的属性列表的末尾。When the is positioned on an element, the new attributes created by the method are placed at the end of the attribute list of the current element. - 在调用 对象的 方法之前，不会插入新属性。The new attributes are not inserted until the method of the object is called. - 如果指定的命名空间前缀为 或 `null`，则将从作用域内的当前命名空间获取新属性的命名空间 URI 的前缀。If the namespace prefix specified is or `null`, the prefix for the namespace URI of the new attribute is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果当前范围内未给指定的命名空间 URI 分配命名空间前缀，则会自动生成一个命名空间前缀。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, a namespace prefix is automatically generated. 例如，若要在 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件的默认命名空间中的元素上创建新属性（`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`），请为命名空间前缀和命名空间 URI 参数指定 `null` 或 。For example to create a new attribute on an element in the default namespace of the `contosoBooks.xml` file, (`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`), you specify `null` or for both the namespace prefix and namespace URI parameters. 指定 `http://www.contoso.com/books` 作为命名空间 URI 参数将导致 方法自动为新属性生成命名空间前缀。Specifying `http://www.contoso.com/books` as the namespace URI parameter will cause the method to auto generate a namespace prefix for the new attribute. - 如果创建的新属性是一个命名空间节点，该节点与元素上的命名空间声明冲突，原因是所选的命名空间前缀是由同一范围内的另一个命名空间声明使用的，或者因为所选前缀与元素的名称相同，但绑定到不同的命名空间 URI，则会引发异常。If the new attribute created is a namespace node which conflicts with a namespace declaration on the element, either because the namespace prefix chosen is used by another namespace declaration at the same scope, or because the prefix chosen is the same as that of the element but is bound to a different namespace URI, an exception is thrown. - 返回的 对象只能用于创建属性。The object returned may only be used to create attributes. 调用不创建属性的其他 对象方法会引发异常。Calling other object methods that do not create attributes throws an exception. - 方法不会影响 的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中，使用从 `discount` 方法返回的 `currency` 对象在 `price` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的 `contosoBooks.xml` 子元素上创建新的 和 属性。In the following example, new `discount` and `currency` attributes are created on the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object returned from the method. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#8)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#8)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从 定位到 参数指定的节点（包含）的当前节点中删除一系列同级节点。The method deletes a range of sibling nodes from the current node the is positioned on (inclusive) to the node specified by the parameter (inclusive). 然后， 将定位在其父节点上。The is then positioned on its parent node. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，使用 方法删除 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件的第一个和第二个 `book` 元素。In the following example, the first and second `book` elements of the `contosoBooks.xml` file are deleted using the method. summary.span: 删除当前节点及其子节点。

span.span: Deletes the current node and its child nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 成功删除后， 将定位在删除节点的父节点上。The is positioned on the deleted node's parent node on successful deletion. - 如果删除的节点是一个文本节点，该节点是一个简单类型化元素的内容，则该元素会丢失其类型信息。If the deleted node is a text node which is the content of a simple typed element, the element loses its type information. 这意味着，当定位在 的元素上时， 和 属性分别具有 `null`、 和 值。This means that when positioned on the element the , and properties have the values `null`, and respectively. - 删除的节点在删除之前 对象仍可访问。Deleted nodes are still accessible to objects positioned over them prior to deletion. 但是，尝试从已删除的子树中移除的方法将失败。However methods that attempt to move away from the deleted sub-tree fail. 例如，当 定位在最顶层的已删除节点上时， 和 方法始终会失败。For example, the and methods always fail when the is positioned over the top most deleted node. 这是因为已删除的节点不再连接到 XML 文档。This is because the deleted node is no longer connected to the XML document. 同样，如果 位于最底部的已删除节点上， 方法始终会失败。Similarly the method always fails if the is positioned on the bottom-most deleted node. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，将使用 方法删除 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件的第一个 `book` 元素的 `price` 元素。In the following example the `price` element of the first `book` element of the `contosoBooks.xml` file is deleted using the method. 在 元素删除之后，`price` 对象的位置位于父级的 `book` 元素上。The position of the object after the `price` element is deleted is on the parent `book` element. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#9)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#9)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 在调用 对象的 方法之前，不会插入新的同级节点。The new sibling node is not inserted until the method of the object is called. - 仅当 位于元素、文本、处理指令或注释节点上时， 方法才有效。The method is valid only when the is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node. - 方法不会影响 的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，使用 方法返回的 对象在 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的 `price` 子元素之后插入一个新的 `pages` 元素。In the following example a new `pages` element is inserted after the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object returned by the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果 对象置于 XML 节点序列上，则将添加序列中的所有节点。If the object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added. - 仅当 位于元素、文本、处理指令或注释节点上时， 方法才有效。The method is valid only when the is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node. - 方法不会影响 的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，使用指定的 对象中包含的节点，在 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的 `price` 子元素之前插入一个新的 `pages` 元素。In the following example a new `pages` element is inserted before the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the node contained in the object specified. 指定了 `http://www.contoso.com/books` 命名空间，以便使用与 XML 文档相同的命名空间插入新的同级元素。The `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace is specified so that the new sibling element is inserted using the same namespace as the XML document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类以相反的文档顺序返回命名空间节点。The class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order. 因此， 实质上移到当前在范围内的最后一个命名空间节点。Therefore, essentially moves to the last namespace node in the current scope. 使用下面的 XML 片段作为示例，如果 定位在 `data` 节点上， 的行为方式如下所示。Using the following XML fragment as an example, if the is positioned on the `data` node, behaves in the following manner. - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` 移动到以下命名空间节点之一： `xmlns:c='C'`、`xmlns:a='A2'`、`xmlns=''`、`xmlns:b='B'`或 `xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`。`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, `xmlns:b='B'`, or `xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`. - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` 移动到以下命名空间节点之一： `xmlns:c='C'`、`xmlns:a='A2'`、`xmlns=''`或 `xmlns:b='B'`。`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, or `xmlns:b='B'`. - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` 移动到 `xmlns:c='C'` 节点。`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` moves to the `xmlns:c='C'` node. ```xml ``` 如果 当前未定位在元素上，此方法将返回 `false` 并且 的位置不会更改。If the is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false` and the position of the does not change. 将 移到命名空间节点后， 属性反映命名空间的名称。After the has been moved to the namespace node, the property reflects the name of the namespace. 如果 位于命名空间节点上，则 、和 的方法不适用。When the is positioned on a namespace node, the methods , , and are not applicable. 这些方法始终 `false` 返回，不更改 的位置。These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the . 相反，你可以调用 移动到下一个命名空间节点。Rather, you can call to move to the next namespace node. 将 置于命名空间节点上后，调用 以返回到元素节点。After the is positioned on an namespace node, call to move back to the element node. 有关命名空间节点的定义，请参阅 W3C [XML 路径语言（XPath）](https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath/all/#data-model)建议的5.4 节。For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C [XML Path Language (XPath)](https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath/all/#data-model) recommendation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 预先计算子节点会将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的开头。Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果有三个子节点用于某个元素，则预置节点将成为第一个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node. 如果不存在子节点，则创建一个新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 在调用 对象的 方法之前，不会插入新的子节点。The new child node is not inserted until the method of the object is called. - 仅当 位于元素节点上时， 方法才有效。The method is valid only when the is positioned on an element node. - 方法不会影响 的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，使用从 方法返回的 对象将新的 `pages` 子元素预置到 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的子元素列表的开头。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is prepended to the beginning of the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object returned from the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 预先计算子节点会将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的开头。Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果有三个子节点用于某个元素，则预置节点将成为第一个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node. 如果不存在子节点，则创建一个新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果 对象置于 XML 节点序列上，则将添加序列中的所有节点。If the object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added. - 仅当 位于元素节点上时， 方法才有效。The method is valid only when the is positioned on an element node. - 方法不会影响 的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，使用指定的 对象中包含的节点，将一个新的 `pages` 子元素预置到 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的子元素列表的开头。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is prepended to the beginning of the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the node contained in the object specified. 指定了 `http://www.contoso.com/books` 命名空间，以便使用与 XML 文档相同的命名空间预置新的子元素。The `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace is specified so that the new child element is prepended using the same namespace as the XML document. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#33](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#33)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#33)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#33)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 预先计算子节点会将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的开头。Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果有三个子节点用于某个元素，则预置节点将成为第一个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node. 如果不存在子节点，则创建一个新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 可以通过使用 或 方法来获取命名空间前缀和 URI 值。Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained by using the or method. 例如，下面的语法通过使用范围内命名空间 `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`在前面预置子元素：For example, the following syntax prepends a child element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ```csharp navigator.PrependChildElement(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` 这会创建新的子 `` 元素。This creates the new child `` element. 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果指定的命名空间前缀 `null` 或 ，则新元素的命名空间 URI 的前缀将从作用域内的当前命名空间中获取。If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or , then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果当前范围内未给指定的命名空间 URI 分配命名空间前缀，则会自动生成一个命名空间前缀。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated. - 仅当 位于元素节点上时， 方法才有效。The method is valid only when the is positioned on an element node. - 方法不会影响 的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在下面的示例中，将一个新的 `pages` 子元素预置到 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的子元素列表的开头。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is prepended to the beginning of the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用此方法时，所选内容的上下文是 的位置。The context for the selection is the position of the when this method is called. 调用此方法后，返回的 表示所选节点集。After calling this method, the returned represents the set of selected nodes. 使用 的 方法可循环访问所选的节点集。Use method of the to iterate over the selected node set. 下面C#的代码循环访问所选的节点集。The following C# code iterates over the selected set of nodes. ```csharp XPathNodeIterator iterator = nav.Select("/bookstore/book"); while (iterator.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(Iterator.Current.Name); } ``` 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 你仍可以使用 对象的任何导航方法在 内移动。You can still use any of the object's navigation methods to move within the . 导航方法与 中的选定节点无关。The navigation methods are independent of the selected nodes in the . - 以后对 方法的调用将返回一个新的 对象，该对象指向与新的 调用匹配的选定节点集。Future calls to the method return a new object that points to the selected set of nodes that matches the new call. 这两个 对象完全相互独立。The two objects are completely independent of each other. - 如果 XPath 表达式需要命名空间解析，请使用 重载，该重载采用 作为其参数。If the XPath expression requires namespace resolution, use the overload, which takes an as its argument. - 此方法对 的状态没有影响。This method has no effect on the state of the . ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法来选择节点集。The following example uses the method to select a node set. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你调用此方法时，所选内容的上下文是 的位置。The context for the selection is the position of the when you called this method. 调用此方法后，返回的 表示所选节点集。After you call this method, the returned represents the set of selected nodes. 使用 上的 来循环访问所选的节点集。Use on the to iterate over the selected node set. 下面C#的代码循环访问所选的节点集。The following C# code iterates over the selected set of nodes. ```csharp XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); while (ni.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(ni.Current.Name); } ``` 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 你仍可以使用 对象的任何导航方法在 内移动。You can still use any of the object's navigation methods to move within the . 导航方法与 中的选定节点无关。The navigation methods are independent of the selected nodes in the . - 以后对 方法的调用将返回一个新的 对象，该对象指向与新的 调用匹配的选定节点集。Future calls to the method return a new object that points to the selected set of nodes that matches the new call. 这两个 对象完全相互独立。The two objects are completely independent of each other. - 如果 需要命名空间解析，则必须将前缀和命名空间 URI 对添加到 ，并且必须调用 方法，以指定要用于命名空间解析的 。If the requires namespace resolution, the prefix and namespace URI pair must be added to an , and the method must be called to specify the to use for namespace resolution. 例如，假定文档包含以下 XML 节点。For example, suppose the document contains the following XML nodes. ```xml Pride And Prejudice ``` 在这种情况下， C#下面的代码选择 `bk:ISBN` 的节点。In this case, the following C# code selects the `bk:ISBN` node. ```csharp XPathExpression expr = nav.Compile("book/@bk:ISBN"); XmlNamespaceManager mngr = new XmlNamespaceManager(new NameTable()); mngr.AddNamespace("bk","urn:samples"); expr.SetContext(mngr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果 不包含前缀，则假定命名空间 URI 为空命名空间。If the does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace URI is the empty namespace. 如果 XML 包含默认命名空间，仍必须使用 方法，并提供包含前缀和命名空间 URI 的 来处理默认命名空间。If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the method and provide an that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace. 例如，假设您具有以下 XML。For example, suppose you have the following XML. ```xml Pride And Prejudice ``` 在这种情况下， C#以下代码选择所有书籍节点：In this case, the following C# code selects all book nodes: ```csharp XmlNamespaceManager nsmgr = new XmlNamespaceManager(nav.NameTable); nsmgr.AddNamespace("ab", "http://www.lucernepublishing.com"); XPathExpression expr; expr = nav.Compile("//ab:book"); expr.SetContext(nsmgr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` 此方法对 的状态没有影响。This method has no effect on the state of the . ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法来选择节点集。The following example uses the method to select a node set. ## Remarks 对于具有原子简单类型或简单文本内容的属性和元素， 属性返回最恰当 .NET Framework 的已装箱 。For attributes and elements with atomic simple type or simple text content, the property returns a boxed of the most appropriate .NET Framework . 如果元素或属性的内容是列表类型，则 属性返回 最适当的 .NET Framework 对象的数组。If the element or attribute's content is a list type, the property returns an array of objects of the most appropriate .NET Framework . 下表描述了每个 返回的 。The following table describes the returned by each . |XPathNodeTypeXPathNodeType|TypedValue 返回TypedValue Returned| |-------------------|-------------------------| ||返回一个 对象，该对象包含文档的所有 节点子代，并通过空格进行连接和分隔。Returns a object containing all node descendants of the document, concatenated and separated by white space. 如果文档中没有任何 节点子级，则返回 。If the document does not have any node children, is returned.| |

（类型化或简单内容）(typed or simple content)|返回表示 的类型化值的 。Returns an that represents the typed value of the .

如果 定义为 XML 架构列表数据类型，则节点值将公开为对象的数组。If the is defined as an XML Schema list data type, then the node value is exposed as an array of objects. 数组中的每个 都包含元素的子元素的类型化值。Each in the array contains the typed value of a child of the element.| |

（非类型化的、混合的或复杂的内容）(untyped, mixed, or complex content)|返回一个 对象，该对象包含 （包括类型化值的字符串表示形式）的所有 节点后代，并通过空格进行连接和分隔。Returns a object containing all node descendants of the (including string representations of typed values), concatenated and separated by white space. 如果 没有任何 节点子级，则返回 。If the does not have any node children, is returned.| |

（类型化或简单内容）(typed or simple content)|返回表示 的类型化值的 。Returns an that represents the typed value of the . 作为 .NET Framework 值装箱。The is boxed as a .NET Framework value.

如果 定义为 XML 架构列表数据类型，则节点值将公开为对象的数组。If the is defined as an XML Schema list data type, the node value is exposed as an array of objects. 数组中的每个 都包含 的子类型的类型化值。Each in the array contains the typed value of a child of the .| ||一个包含文本的 对象。A object containing the text.| ||一个 对象，其中包含注释的内容，不包括周围的 ``。A object containing the content of the comments, excluding the surrounding ``.| ||一个 对象，该对象包含处理指令的内容，不包括目标和围绕 ``。A object containing the content of the processing instruction, excluding the target and surrounding ``.| ||一个包含命名空间名称的 对象。A object containing the namespace name.| ||一个包含节点文本的 对象。A object containing the text of the node.| ||一个包含节点文本的 对象。A object containing the text of the node.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可由在存储区上提供 "虚拟化" XML 视图的 实现使用，以提供对基础对象的访问。The property can be used by implementations which provide a "virtualized" XML view over a store, to provide access to underlying objects. 例如，如果 对象用于通过公共语言运行时（CLR）对象图提供虚拟 XML 视图，则可能希望使用 方法执行 XPath 查询，然后访问所选节点下的 CLR 对象。For example, if an object is used to provide a virtual XML view over a Common Language Runtime (CLR) object graph, you may wish to perform XPath queries using the method and then access the CLR objects underlying the selected nodes. 属性将公开这些基础对象。The property would expose these underlying objects. 在许多情况下，此值将 `null`，并且 属性返回的对象将始终为实现特定的。In many cases, this value will be `null`, and the object returned by the property will always be implementation specific. 属性应该保留对象标识，只应用于返回与各自的重叠项具有一对一对应关系的对象。The property should preserve object identity and should only be used to return objects that have a one-to-one correspondence to their respective overlaid items. 用户应始终使用同一个 对象或已克隆的对象，在对同一节点的连续访问上获得相同的对象。A user should always get the same object on successive visits to the same node using the same object or a cloned one. > [!NOTE] > 对象创建的 对象的 属性返回相应的 。The property of an object created by an object returns the corresponding .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 包含架构或类型信息（例如，从使用 XML 架构验证 初始化的 对象），并且如果当前节点定义为 XML 架构 `xs:boolean` 类型，则 属性以取消装箱的 对象的形式返回当前节点的值。If the has schema or type information (for example, from an object initialized with an XML schema validating ), and if the current node is defined as an XML Schema `xs:boolean` type, the property returns the current node's value as an unboxed object. 但是，如果 没有任何架构或类型信息，则 属性将尝试根据 `xs:boolean`的 XPath 2.0 强制转换规则，将当前节点的字符串值转换为 值。However, if the does not have any schema or type information, the property attempts to convert the string value of the current node to a value, according to the XPath 2.0 casting rules for `xs:boolean`. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，将使用 、、、和 属性返回 `valueas.xml` 文件中每个元素的值。In the following example, the value of each element in the `valueas.xml` file is returned using the , , , , and properties. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorProperties#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/CPP/xpathnavigatorproperties.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorProperties#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/CS/xpathnavigatorproperties.cs#5)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorProperties#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/VB/xpathnavigatorproperties.vb#5)] 该示例使用 `valueas.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `valueas.xml` file as an input. ```xml true 2004-04-20T12:00:00 10.00 100000000 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取当前节点的类型化值 的 .NET Framework。The property gets the .NET Framework of the typed value of the current node. 例如，默认情况下，类型 `xs:int` 的元素具有 。For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a of by default. 但 可以是可以映射到 `xs:int` （例如 或 ）的有效类型之一。However, the could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int` such as or . 如果节点没有类型，则它等效于正在 `xdt:untypedAtomic`的节点上的类型批注。If a node has no type, this is equivalent to the type annotation on the node being `xdt:untypedAtomic`. 在这种情况下， 属性返回节点的字符串。In this case, the property returns a string for the node. 有关详细信息，请参阅[System.web 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md). ## Examples 在下面的示例中，`contosoBooks.xml` XML 文件和 `contosoBooks.xsd` XML 架构定义语言（XSD）架构用于创建 对象。In the following example, the `contosoBooks.xml` XML file and `contosoBooks.xsd` XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema are used to create an object. 使用 属性显示 `price` 元素的类型化值，然后使用 方法将其作为字符串返回。The typed value of the `price` element is displayed using the property and then returned as a string using the method. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorProperties#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/CPP/xpathnavigatorproperties.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorProperties#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/CS/xpathnavigatorproperties.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorProperties#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/VB/xpathnavigatorproperties.vb#6)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ``` 该示例还使用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 作为输入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将当前节点的范围内命名空间的命名空间声明插入到指定的 对象的 XML 中。Namespace declarations for the in-scope namespaces of the current node are inserted into the XML streamed to the object specified. 例如，如果在 `books.xml` 文件的第一个 `book` 元素上调用 方法，则在 XML 文档顶部进行的 `http://www.contoso.com/books` 命名空间声明将在流中显示为所指定的 对象，如下面的示例中所示。For example, if the method is called on the first `book` element of the `books.xml` file, the `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace declaration made at the top of the XML document will appear in the XML streamed to the object specified as shown in the following example. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 ``` > [!NOTE] > 方法不会影响 的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何对 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件的第一个 `book` 元素使用 方法。The following example illustrates using the method on the first `book` element of the `contosoBooks.xml` file. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#48)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#48)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面是使用 属性时需要注意的重要事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the property. - 属性 `null`，除非 的 属性的 属性设置为 。The property is `null`, unless the property of the property of the is set to . - 如果此节点有效，则 属性与 的 属性的 属性相同，除非此节点是联合的成员。If this node is valid, the property is the same as the property of the property of the , unless this node is a member of a union. - 如果此节点是联合的成员，则 属性与此 的 属性的 属性相同。If this node is a member of a union, the property is the same as the property of the property of this .
